testcase.classname: Verify main functionalities of Pet Store website
testcase.name: Login successfully with existing user on different browsers - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the PetStore login page with "chrome"...................passed When I enter the username "JQuim_3" and password "Pass666"..................passed And I click the Login button................................................passed Then I should be logged in and see "Welcome Joaquim!" on the page...........passed

testcase.classname: Verify main functionalities of Pet Store website
testcase.name: Login successfully with existing user on different browsers - Example #1.2
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the PetStore login page with "firefox"..................passed When I enter the username "MariliaB" and password "Pass999".................passed And I click the Login button................................................passed Then I should be logged in and see "Welcome Marilia!" on the page...........passed
